title: Christian James Hand
description:
Christian James Hand helps you listen to music in a whole new way. He is the host and creator of "The Session" a radio and live show, breaking down classic rock songs into their individual  master recording tracks to hear songs in a whole new way. 

Listen to the free Sessions on SoundCloud! 
https://soundcloud.com/theklossessions

 

New Shirts: https://www.blipshift/com/tst

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

 

This show is a video: https://youtu.be/gATeYymEJbs

 

Check out our merch!

https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
